extension.summary: Effortlessly create multiroom sharing with Kodi clients throughout your network.
extension.description: Share what your viewing with multiple Kodi clients throughout your network.[CR]Share local content, plugins, UPNP and PVR backends. Share one central experience throughout your home.
extension.disclaimer: *Requires all Kodi instances configured with a centralized file server and database.[CR]Each client requires identical configuration "InSync" with the master, same access to files, plugins and PVR backend sources. *See: http://kodi.wiki/view/Syncing_and_sharing
